Reviews.Title: A canon camera for the 21st century
Reviews.Author: SunnyDay
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are spectacular. It was like opening a christmas present there were so many extras.  If you have ever owned an old SLR camera as I have,  this one is a breeze and a pleasure to operate and the pictures are of a very high quality.  If you have never owned one this will not be a great challange to learn, especially in automatic mode.  I have and love my two previous canon cameras, an AE1 and an FTB but this one is majic.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens Brand New USA w/ All Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS AF Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Charger Attachment
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card + USB SDHC Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet

ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens + EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens + LP-E8 Replacement Lithium Ion Battery + External Rapid Charger + 16GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto Lens + 58mm 3 Piece Filter Kit + Mini HDMI Cable + Carrying Case + Full Size Tripod + External Flash + SDHC Card USB Reader + Memory Card Wallet + Deluxe Starter Kit DavisMAX Bundle
